title: Athletism — Tennis (Elite) — Phase 3: Max Strength — Lower & Rotational Base
equipment: Gym: rack, barbells, dumbbells, cables, landmine
goal: Raise force ceiling for explosive first step and stable stroke base.

warmup: Mobility 8–10' (ankle DF, hips, T‑spine, shoulder IR/ER)
Activation 6–8' (glute med, deep core, scapular control)
Footwork prep: pogos, carioca, lateral skips, crossover steps

notes: Week 1: 5x5; Week 2: 4x4 heavier; include isometric mid‑thigh pulls 3x3 @3–5''.
